title: Season 2, Ep 68 - But What About the Baron?
description:
Baron Ragoon barges into the Ruffled Feather hoping to move the story along.


Credits

Arnie: Arnie Niekamp

Chunt: Adal Rifai

Usidore: Matt Young

Baron Ragoon: Chris Rathjen

Winky Silks: Joey Bland

Mysterious Man: Tim Sniffen

Tricia: Kate James


Producers: Arnie Niekamp, Ryan DiGiorgi, Evan Jacover

Editor: Ryan DiGiorgi

Theme Music: Andy Poland

Magic Tavern Logo: Allard Laban

Audio Assistance: Jason Knox

Production Assistance: Garrett Schultz
